typeSystemDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.typesystems.CommandTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: A type system containing types for influencing annotator execution.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.command.CommandAbort
typeDescription.description: Command to abort pipeline processing. No more annotators will be executed potentially ignoring all other commands.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.command.CommandProceedAtAnnotator
typeDescription.description: Command to proceed at a specific annotator. This command skips also included annotators and proceeds at an potentially excluded annotator. If multiple annoations of this type are present, then the pipeline will continue at the next possible annotator.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: Name of the annotator to proceed at.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.command.CommandIncludeAnnotators
typeDescription.description: Command to include specific annotators in the further processing. Only listed annotators will be executed if the command is given. Included annotators cannot be excluded. The names of multiple commands of this type will be merged.

featureDescription.name: names
featureDescription.description: Names of the annotators that should be included in the pipeline processing.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.command.CommandExcludeAnnotators
typeDescription.description: Command to exclude specific annotators in the further processing. Listed annotators will be skipped if no explicitly listed in an include command. The names of multiple commands of this type will be merged.

featureDescription.name: names
featureDescription.description: Names of the annotators that should be excluded in the pipeline processing.
